quotes.quote: There are people who, instead of listening to what is being said to them, are already listening to what they are going to say themselves.
quotes.author: Albert Guinon

quotes.quote: No man ever listened himself out of a job.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Make sure you have finished speaking before your audience has finished listening.
quotes.author: Dorothy Sarnoff

quotes.quote: When people talk, listen completely. Most people never listen.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: To listen closely and reply well is the highest perfection we are able to attain in the art of conversation.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Be a good listener. Your ears will never get you in trouble.
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.quote: Listen. Do not have an opinion while you listen because frankly, your opinion doesn't hold much water outside of Your Universe. Just listen. Listen until their brain has been twisted like a dripping towel and what they have to say is all over the floor.
quotes.author: Hugh Elliott

quotes.quote: A good listener is a good talker with a sore throat.
quotes.author: Katharine Whitehorn

quotes.quote: A good listener is usually thinking about something else.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Maybe I wanted to hear it so badly that my ears betrayed my mind in order to secure my heart.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: No one really listens to anyone else, and if you try it for a while you'll see why.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Everybody lies, but it doesn't matter because nobody listens.
quotes.author: Nick Diamos

quotes.quote: It is the province of knowledge to speak and it is the privilege of wisdom to listen.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Know how to listen, and you will profit even from those who talk badly.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: As I get older, I've learned to listen to people rather than accuse them of things.
quotes.author: Po Bronson

quotes.quote: My parents taught me how to listen to everybody before I made up my own mind. When you listen, you learn. You absorb like a sponge-and your life becomes so much better than when you are just trying to be listened to all the time.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: A good listener is not only popular everywhere, but after a while he gets to know something.
